name: crontab-ui
description: Easy and safe way to manage your crontab file

scripts.docker_rebuild: docker compose kill && docker compose down && docker compose up -d --build
scripts.gitSync: git fetch --all && git stash && git pull && git stash pop
scripts.gitUpdate: git add . && git commit -m"update docker-crontab-tryout," && git pull && git push

author: Suresh Alse
